name: minidlna
description: The plugin installs and configures a miniDLNA server.
author: gvolt

volumio_info.details:
miniDLNA Plugin


The plugin installs a miniDLNA (aka ReadyMedia) server.
Through Volumioâ€™s UI the plugin provides access to the configuration options of the miniDLNA server.
The plugin also features a rescan button that allows to force a rescan of all media directories for new media files.
